actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to define the term "employee" more precisely.

summary.text: Defines the term "employee", under the Occupational Safety and Health Act, as an employee of an employer who is employed in a business of his employer which affects commerce and receives monetary compensation for his services. (Amends 29 U.S.C. 652)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to define the term "employee" more precisely.
